data.lyric:
[ti:Love Ain't]
[ar:Eli Young Band]
[al:Soundtrack To Summer 2018]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Love Ain't - Eli Young Band
[00:10.05]Hotels are made for two night stays
[00:12.68]Checking in and out
[00:14.58]Meeting strangers in the lobby
[00:16.67]Waking up and leaving town
[00:19.41]The next day
[00:20.66]
[00:21.48]But love ain't
[00:22.74]
[00:24.73]And whiskey's poured for when you're bored
[00:26.98]And alone on Friday night
[00:28.84]
[00:29.91]When you want to lose yourself
[00:32.02]And need a place to hide
[00:33.63]From all the pain
[00:35.57]
[00:36.08]But love ain't
[00:37.47]
[00:39.04]Love ain't you on a sidewalk
[00:41.37]In your new dress all alone
[00:44.03]Love ain't you calling me because
[00:46.41]He ain't picking up his phone
[00:48.60]The way you're talking sounds like
[00:51.13]He's somebody you should hate
[00:53.60]I may not know what love is girl
[00:56.34]But I know what love ain't
[00:58.47]Come over let me show you what he can't
[01:02.22]
[01:03.92]'Cause he can only show you what love ain't
[01:07.07]
[01:08.73]Sad movies are for crying on the couch
[01:11.61]There in the dark
[01:13.41]That sad song it was written
[01:15.29]
[01:15.92]Just to try and get your heart to break
[01:18.97]
[01:20.15]But love ain't
[01:21.43]
[01:22.87]Love ain't you on a sidewalk in
[01:25.70]Your new dress all alone
[01:27.89]Love ain't you calling me because
[01:30.41]He ain't picking up his phone
[01:32.77]The way you're talking sounds like
[01:35.26]He's somebody you should hate
[01:37.69]I may not know what love is girl
[01:40.40]But I know what love ain't
[01:42.57]Come over let me show you what he can't
[01:46.33]
[01:47.48]'Cause he can only show you what love ain't
[01:51.47]
[01:51.98]Love
[01:52.56]
[01:54.52]Yeah yeah
[01:55.72]
[01:56.96]Oh oh oh
[01:58.52]
[02:02.09]Love ain't I wonder what he's doing
[02:04.64]Love ain't feeling like a fool
[02:06.86]And you can't keeping letting him do it to you
[02:10.34]
[02:11.04]Ah
[02:11.65]'Cause love ain't you on a sidewalk
[02:14.50]In your new dress all alone
[02:16.90]Love ain't you calling me because
[02:19.40]He ain't picking up his phone
[02:21.78]The way you're talking sounds like
[02:24.20]He's somebody you should hate
[02:26.61]I may not know what love is girl
[02:29.38]But I know what love ain't
[02:31.53]I may not know what love is girl
[02:34.33]But I know what love ain't
[02:36.44]Come over let me show you what he can't
[02:40.20]
[02:41.75]'Cause he can only show you what love ain't
[02:45.19]
[02:46.16]Love ain't love ain't a new
[02:49.82]Love ain't
[02:50.72]Love ain't
data.trans:
[ti:Love Ain't]
[ar:Eli Young Band]
[al:Soundtrack To Summer 2018]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:10.05]酒店给两个在外留宿的人提供了住所
[00:12.68]登记入住 结账离开
[00:14.58]在大厅里碰到陌生人
[00:16.67]第二天醒来
[00:19.41]离开这个城市
[00:20.66]
[00:21.48]但爱不是这样
[00:22.74]
[00:24.73]无聊的时候 倒上一杯香槟
[00:26.98]独自过完周五夜晚
[00:28.84]
[00:29.91]当你想要彻底疯一次时
[00:32.02]需要找个地方
[00:33.63]忘记所有的痛
[00:35.57]
[00:36.08]但爱不是这样
[00:37.47]
[00:39.04]爱情不是你穿着新衣服
[00:41.37]独自走在人行道上
[00:44.03]爱情不是在别人不接你电话时
[00:46.41]转头打给了我
[00:48.60]你说话的口气让我觉得
[00:51.13]你真正恨的是他
[00:53.60]我也许不明白爱的真谛 女孩
[00:56.34]但我知道 这些都不是爱
[00:58.47]过来 我要做一些他做不到的事情
[01:02.22]
[01:03.92]因为他对你做的那些都不是爱
[01:07.07]
[01:08.73]悲情的电影适合在沙发上边哭边看
[01:11.61]周围环境一片漆黑
[01:13.41]那些悲伤的歌曲
[01:15.29]
[01:15.92]就是为了勾起你的伤心往事
[01:18.97]
[01:20.15]但爱不是这样
[01:21.43]
[01:22.87]爱情不是你穿着新衣服
[01:25.70]独自走在人行道上
[01:27.89]爱情不是在他不接你电话时
[01:30.41]转头打给了我
[01:32.77]你说话的口气让我觉得
[01:35.26]你真正恨的是他
[01:37.69]我也许不明白爱的真谛 女孩
[01:40.40]但我知道 这些都不是爱
[01:42.57]过来 我要做一些他做不到的事情
[01:46.33]
[01:47.48]因为他对你做的那些都不是爱
[01:51.47]
[01:51.98]爱
[01:52.56]
[01:54.52]//
[01:55.72]
[01:56.96]//
[01:58.52]
[02:02.09]爱不是只会幻想他正在做什么
[02:04.64]爱不是把自己当成傻瓜
[02:06.86]你不能让他一直这样伤害你
[02:10.34]
[02:11.04]//
[02:11.65]因为爱情不是你穿着新衣服
[02:14.50]独自走在人行道上
[02:16.90]爱情不是在他不接你电话时
[02:19.40]转头打给了我
[02:21.78]你说话的口气让我觉得
[02:24.20]你真正恨的是他
[02:26.61]我也许不明白爱的真谛 女孩
[02:29.38]但我知道 这些都不是爱
[02:31.53]我也许不明白爱的真谛 女孩
[02:34.33]但我知道 这些都不是爱
[02:36.44]过来 我要做一些他做不到的事情
[02:40.20]
[02:41.75]因为他对你做的那些都不是爱
[02:45.19]
[02:46.16]爱情不是新衣服
[02:49.82]爱不是
[02:50.72]爱不是
